mapper.select: SELECT A.pj_mem_id ,A.pj_id ,A.user_id ,A.pj_role_id ,B.PJ_NAME FROM project_member A INNER JOIN project B ON (A.PJ_ID = B.PJ_ID) WHERE A.pj_id = #{pjId} AND A.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT pj_board_id ,pj_mem_id ,pj_id ,pj_board_title ,pj_board_created_dt FROM project_board WHERE pj_id = #{pjId} AND pj_board_cate_code = 'P0501' AND pj_board_is_del = 'N' ORDER BY pj_board_id DESC ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT task_id ,task_assignee_id ,task_end_date ,pj_id ,task_name FROM task_board WHERE task_assignee_id = #{pjMemId} AND task_is_del = 'N' ORDER BY task_end_date ASC ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT todo_id ,pj_mem_id ,pj_id ,todo_title ,todo_end_date FROM todo_list WHERE pj_mem_id = #{pjMemId} AND todo_st_code = 'T0101' AND todo_is_del = 'N' ORDER BY todo_end_date ASC ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT issue_id ,issue_handler_id ,A.pj_id ,issue_title , user_name FROM issue A INNER JOIN project_member B ON (B.pj_mem_id = A.issue_handler_id) INNER JOIN users C ON (C.user_id = B.user_id) WHERE A.pj_id = #{pjId} AND issue_is_del = 'N' ORDER BY issue_id DESC ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT SUBSTR(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(pj_created_dt,'YYYYMMDD'),'/',''),1,6) || '01' AS pj_created_dt ,SUBSTR(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(pj_end_dt,'YYYYMMDD'),'/',''),1,6) || '01' AS pj_end_dt ,SUBSTR(task_start_date,1,6) || '01' AS task_start_date ,task_progress/100 AS task_progress ,SUBSTR(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'/',''),1,6) || '01' AS today FROM task_board A INNER JOIN project B ON (A.pj_id = B.pj_id) WHERE A.pj_id = #{pjId} AND task_is_del = 'N'

SELECT user_name ,COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM task_board A INNER JOIN project_member B ON (A.task_assignee_id = B.pj_mem_id) INNER JOIN users C on (B.user_id = C.user_id) WHERE A.pj_id = #{pjId} AND task_is_del = 'N' GROUP BY user_name

SELECT user_name ,COUNT(*) AS daily_task_count FROM daily_report A INNER JOIN project_member B ON (A.pj_mem_id = B.pj_mem_id) INNER JOIN users C on (B.user_id = C.user_id) WHERE A.pj_id = #{pjId} AND dreport_is_del = 'N' GROUP BY user_name
